snippet: State senators said Thursday that they had reached a bipartisan deal on a framework to expand Medicaid to about 50,000 low-income adults.
abstract: New Hampshire state senators say they have reached bipartisan deal on framework to expand Medicaid to about 50,000 low-income adults.
lead_paragraph: State senators said Thursday that they had reached a bipartisan deal on a framework to expand Medicaid to about 50,000 low-income adults.

headline.main: New Hampshire: Deal Reached on Medicaid Expansion
headline.print_headline: New Hampshire: Deal Reached on Medicaid Expansion
